General.Name: Ausom Enterprise Limited
General.Description: AuSom Enterprise Limited operates as trading company in India. The company trades in commodities, bullions, gold jewelry, diamonds, derivatives, shares and securities, and units of mutual funds. It also involved in the manufacturing of gold jewelry. The company was formerly known as Core Emballage Limited. AuSom Enterprise Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
